question: Why am I always hungry after eating my favorite candy bar?
You need more than just sugar for energy! Try a turkey sandwich. It's got protein, carbs, and fats, the 'Big Three' your body needs to stay fueled!
I can't believe I lost the race. I ate loads of pasta last night for energy!
Hey, why are avocados, chicken, and bread all good for me? They're so different!
I'm a steak and potatoes kind of guy. Why bother with those tiny peas and carrots?
Think of them as the special forces of your meal! Tiny but packed with vital vitamins and minerals. They're the Micronutrient Masters!
I just don't understand why I should care about these tiny vitamins and minerals.
Well, imagine building a house without nails. Sure, they're small, but no nails, no house! That's how your body feels about micronutrients.
Why can't I just have a mega milkshake for breakfast, lunch, and dinner?
Why can't I just eat burgers all day? They're delicious!
I've heard of DIY, but what's this DRI thing?
Well, if DIY is 'Do It Yourself,' then DRI is 'Diet Right, Individual!' It's a guide to how much of each nutrient you need daily.
Why can't I just eat what I feel like? Why should I follow these DRIs?
Imagine you're a rock star and your body is the band. DRIs are like sheet music, helping every part play in harmony for a hit performance!
If I eat a whole pizza, that's balanced, right? It's a circle after all!
Balanced diet isn't about geometry, it's about variety! Try mixing in some veggies, lean proteins, and whole grains with that cheesy goodness.
So, if I'm balancing my diet, does that mean I can't ever eat ice cream?
No way! It's like a party – veggies, fruits, proteins, and grains are your best pals, but every now and then, you invite the wild friend – ice cream!
Why can't I just eat all fruits and call it a day?
Well, if you were a fruit bat, that'd be perfect. But humans need a mix of foods – think of it as your meal's very own super team!
Why can't my food group just be 'delicious things'?
Why do I need to eat vegetables if I'm not a rabbit?
Just like superheroes team up to save the day, food groups team up to save your health. Each group has unique powers, even those stealthy veggies!
I'm more of a 'meat and potatoes' person. Do I really need the other stuff?
Sure, if you want to drive with only two wheels! A balanced diet is like a car, all food groups are needed to keep it running smoothly.
Why can't I just eat all the cupcakes I want? They're so small!
Imagine your body is a car. You wouldn't overfill the tank, right? Same with calories – too much and you might start to overflow!
I just don't get why I can't have five cheeseburgers for lunch.
Think of calories as currency. You've got a daily budget to spend on food. Five cheeseburgers might leave you broke for the day!
So, if I run a lot, can I eat a whole pizza?
Running a marathon? Maybe! It's all about balance. You burn calories when you're active, but even Usain Bolt can't outrun a pizza every day!
Why should I bother reading food labels? I know what I like!
Sure, but imagine buying a book based only on the cover. Reading food labels is like reading the plot summary, it tells you what's really inside!
Why can't I just eat what tastes good? Why bother with all the small print?
Think of it as a treasure map! Food labels guide you to the nutritious gold and help you avoid the junk food traps!
Food labels are so boring. Why can't I just enjoy my snack?
Why do I need to eat vegetables? Can't I just have more pizza?
So what if I don't eat enough fruits and nuts? They're not that tasty anyway.
I don't like fish. Can I just eat chicken instead?
You could, but it's like replacing all the singers in a band with drummers. You'll miss out on some key notes – like omega-3 fatty acids from fish!
Why can't I just eat junk food all day and exercise it off later?
So, if I just skip meals, I won't have to worry about gaining weight, right?
Why does everyone make a big deal about obesity? Can't I just be happy and eat what I want?
Why can't I just eat what my body craves? Isn't it telling me what it needs?
Dietary guidelines seem so boring. Why can't I just have fun with my food?
Think of them as a treasure map, not a rulebook. They're designed to guide you towards the nutritional 'gold' and help you dodge the 'junk' food traps!
I don't get why I should follow dietary guidelines. Why can't I just eat what I want?
Why can't I just eat whatever I feel like? Why do I have to plan my meals?
Imagine setting off on a road trip with no map! Meal planning is like your GPS, guiding you to a balanced diet.
Meal planning sounds like too much work. Can't I just wing it?
I just don't see the point of meal planning. It feels too restrictive.
Think of it as a food festival! You get to pick and choose what you want to eat, ensuring variety and fun. It's your personal menu for the week!
Why can't I just drink soda all day? It's liquid too, right?
Sure, and a cactus is a plant, but I wouldn't recommend hugging one! Water is your body's favorite drink, helping keep everything running smoothly.
Water is so boring. Why can't I just have juice instead?
Imagine you're a fish. Would you want to swim in juice? No way! Water is the best way to keep your inner 'fish' happy and hydrated.
I don't get why I have to drink so much water. Can't I just have a coffee?
Why can't I just eat the same thing as my friends? Why do I have to follow a special diet?
Think of it as your personal superhero suit. Just like superheroes need special gear, some bodies need special diets to feel their best.
I don't get why I can't just eat regular food. Why do I have to eat gluten-free?
I'm a vegetarian. Why can't I just eat loads of cheese and pasta?
Why can't I just eat all the candy I want? It's so good!
Why can't I just eat a whole pizza? It's so yummy!
I just don't get why I can't just eat what I want. Why does digestion matter?
Imagine you're a car. Eating is like filling up your gas tank, but digestion and absorption are what actually powers your engine.
Why can't I just eat burgers and fries all day? They're so tasty!
options: Role of Diet in Disease Prevention (correct answer)

question: Why should I eat fruits and veggies? Can't I just have more meat?
Think of your body as a superhero. Fruits and veggies are like your power crystals, and too much meat might be your kryptonite!
options: Role of Diet in Disease Prevention (correct answer)

question: I don't get why I should eat healthy. What's the big deal?
Imagine you're a knight fighting dragons. Eating healthy is like upgrading your armor, helping protect you from the fiery breath of disease.
options: Role of Diet in Disease Prevention (correct answer)
